thread.section_title: Hotel Galileo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: excellent location and courteous service
thread.title_full: excellent location and courteous service - Review of Hotel Galileo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: whyme2017
title: excellent location and courteous service
text: Great location, clean facility, and pleasant, courteous staff; Dorine at the front desk was amazing - helped us feel welcome and made our stay comfortable; Christopher is an awesome resource for planning your trips, getting advice on things to do and getting reservations. Overall, wonderful experience - would love to stay there again.
